steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Insert' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Illustrations' group, click on the 'Shapes' button.
Select the desired shape from the drop-down menu.
Click and drag on the document to draw the shape.
Release the mouse button to finalize the shape.
Adjust the size, position, and formatting of the shape as needed.
Save the document to apply the changes.
